metadata.code: National Building Code of Canada 2023 - Alberta Edition

requirements.description: This Section applies to the installation of service facilities in buildings
requirements.exact_quote: This Section applies to the installation of service facilities in buildings

requirements.description: Every dwelling unit shall be provided with a supply of potable water
requirements.exact_quote: Every dwelling unit shall be provided with a supply of potable water

requirements.description: Water piping shall conform to the requirements of the National Plumbing Code
requirements.exact_quote: Water piping shall conform to the requirements of the National Plumbing Code

requirements.description: Every dwelling unit shall be equipped with a water heater capable of providing hot water to fixtures requiring hot water
requirements.exact_quote: Every dwelling unit shall be equipped with a water heater capable of providing hot water to fixtures requiring hot water

requirements.description: Maximum hot water temperature at fixtures in dwelling units
requirements.exact_quote: Hot water temperature at fixtures shall not exceed 49 degrees C in dwelling units

requirements.description: Water heaters shall be installed with clearances as specified by the manufacturer
requirements.exact_quote: Water heaters shall be installed with clearances as specified by the manufacturer

requirements.description: Water heaters shall be equipped with temperature and pressure relief valves
requirements.exact_quote: Water heaters shall be equipped with temperature and pressure relief valves

requirements.description: Every building with plumbing fixtures shall be connected to a sanitary sewage system
requirements.exact_quote: Every building with plumbing fixtures shall be connected to a sanitary sewage system

requirements.description: Where public sanitary sewer is not available, private sewage disposal systems shall conform to applicable provincial or municipal regulations
requirements.exact_quote: Where public sanitary sewer is not available, private sewage disposal systems shall conform to applicable provincial or municipal regulations

requirements.description: A floor drain shall be provided in rooms containing a clothes washing machine
requirements.exact_quote: A floor drain shall be provided in rooms containing a clothes washing machine

requirements.description: A floor drain shall be provided in mechanical rooms containing water heating or water treatment equipment
requirements.exact_quote: A floor drain shall be provided in mechanical rooms containing water heating or water treatment equipment

requirements.description: Floor drains in attached garages shall be connected to an oil interceptor
requirements.exact_quote: Floor drains in attached garages shall be connected to an oil interceptor

requirements.description: Floor surfaces shall be sloped to direct water to floor drains
requirements.exact_quote: Floor surfaces shall be sloped to direct water to floor drains

requirements.description: Every dwelling unit shall be provided with electrical service conforming to the Canadian Electrical Code
requirements.exact_quote: Every dwelling unit shall be provided with electrical service conforming to the Canadian Electrical Code

requirements.description: Maximum spacing between receptacle outlets along walls in habitable rooms
requirements.exact_quote: Receptacle outlets in habitable rooms shall be spaced so that no point along the floor line is more than 1.8 m from an outlet

requirements.description: Kitchen counter space shall have receptacle outlets installed per Canadian Electrical Code requirements
requirements.exact_quote: Kitchen counter space shall have receptacle outlets installed per Canadian Electrical Code requirements

requirements.description: Permanent lighting fixtures or switched receptacles shall be provided in every habitable room
requirements.exact_quote: Permanent lighting fixtures or switched receptacles shall be provided in every habitable room

requirements.description: Stairways shall be illuminated with three-way switches at top and bottom of stairs
requirements.exact_quote: Stairways shall be illuminated with three-way switches at top and bottom of stairs
